Room.Name: Dining Hall Accessway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the balcony overlooking the main dining hall.
Room.LongDescription: You are in the small accessway leading around the main dining hall. This is where the maids and servants go through to get from the kitchen to the rear of the hall where they serve dinner. You can see through the balcony to the large dining hall. Across the way to the west, you can see the other balcony.
